title: Website not syncing account properly
body:
I recently fixed the (requires level 7 to post) sync error but the website still displays my old username. 
When I go under the tab from my name and select the BOARDS PROFILE, it links me to the page of 
the old username and I get 404 not found. Is there any way to properly sync?

replies.body: This is a bug that happens from time to time. We'll have your profile synced asap!
Looks like ol' Wuks might have gotten your account synced up already! Just reply to my comment here if it's still not working right.
